entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • GenAPI emits nullable attributes rather than nullable syntax. #33853
  • .NET Native Library Packaging (RuntimeIdentifiers, build, testing, VS etc.) #33845

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle when the target graph is TF/RID to pull out the TF piece #33863
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Stabilize branding for the 7.0.400 release #33862
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update dotnet tool update command: Download tool packages from nuget when update global tools #33861
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #33852
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Create VS shortcut with SDK build environment automatically loaded #33839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Containers: prefer atomic layer upload #33336
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 7.0.10
  • Containers: support mapping non-portable (source-built) rids to container manifest platforms. #33775
    Area-Containers

Updated

  • Support for DisableDiagnosticTracing to suppress TRACE #22883
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use install state in workload manifest provider #33643
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads
  • Update the existing NETSDK 1045 error message to link to the download page #33446
    untriaged
  • Reenable in-test timeout #33700
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Tool install global command: Download tool packages from nuget when installing global tools #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [Containers] Enable multi-RID and multi-project containerization #33166
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Unblock sln add for a shared project #33837
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Containers: sync CreateNewImageToolTask with new CreateNewImage properties. #33765
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: handle Basic auth, registries with non-Uri Realms, and registries that do not provide Service information #33753
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Add tests for disabling JsonSerializer.IsReflectionEnabledByDefault on `PublishTrimmed=true` #33757
    untriaged, Area-ILLink, DO NOT MERGE
  • Update param in CoreGenerateSatelliteAssemblies #24514
    Area-Compilers
